snippet.title: NHL 18 | NHL Threes Official Gameplay Trailer | Xbox One, PS4
snippet.description:
Pre-Order for Early Access: http://x.ea.com/33262
NHL 18 features: http://x.ea.com/33267

An all-new 3-on-3 hockey experience with bigger hits, faster action and more goals. NHL THREES is inspired by fun, pick-up-and-play arcade sports games where you can play any way you want to, online or offline, co-op or competitive. NHL Threes amps up the action with faster skating, bigger bone-crushing hits, and more open-ice to create plays, execute big dangles, and score highlight-reel goals. 

Available worldwide September 15, 2017 for Xbox One and PS4.

Subscribe: http://x.ea.com/33295
